Base Thickness: 1.25"

Shiny, Sparkly, Silver Mirror Mosaic Candle Holder Columns
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Brighten any room or event with shiny, sparkly, rose gold mirror mosaic accented decorative Candle Holders, you can add a dash of imperial sheen into your flower arrangements, bouquets, and plant decorations.  Either place these on their own to exude surreal shimmer and glimmer, or top with pots of fresh or artificial flowers, kissing balls, plants, or candles to create a charming medley of colors, sparkle, and festive glee.


Additional Information:

  • Material: Polystone | Fiberglass | Mirror
  • Qty: 1 Pc per order
  • Color: Silver
  • Height: 3 Ft
  • Top Diameter: 10"
  • Top Opening Diameter: 7.5"
  • Top Depth: 9.5”
  • Base Diameter: 11"
  • Base Thickness: 1.25"
  • Finish: Textured
  • Shiny, Sparkly, Silver Mirror Mosaic Candle Holder Columns
  • Extra bonus One Glass Mirror Strip - 1 ft length with 177 glass mirrors (approx) will be included in case of missing/damage, can be replaced easily, free of charge.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Note: Due to delicacy of the item, pieces may fall off during transit. We will add additional mirrors with the item and  can be glue back easily.

[Information]

Brighten any room or event‚ ambiance with an elegant sparkle that is always in style. With shiny, sparkly, silver mirror mosaic accented decorative columns, you can add a dash of imperial sheen into your flower arrangements, bouquets, and plant decorations. With stylish, glitzy, and glamorous design, these silver mosaic Candle Holders are a perfect addition to any modern home, posh party, or an elite gathering.

Slender, artistic shape coupled with brilliantly mosaic mirror accented design grant these tall columns an attention grabbing charisma. Throw some light on these reflecting mirror adorned columns to create a majestic spectacle of glitz and glam. Either place these on their own to exude surreal shimmer and glimmer, or top with pots of fresh or artificial flowers, kissing balls, plants, or candles to create a charming medley of colors, sparkle, and festive glee.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Polystone | Fiberglass | Mirror
  • Qty: 1 Pcs Candle Holder

  • Base: 13" 
  • Includes extra mirror straps

  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Style: Empirical

Each column has 5 parts: 2 Middle, 1 Cap, 1 Top, and 1 Bottom.
Middle Pieces are hollow. Additional decorations not included
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information] 

Height Adjustable Columns:

Romans ruled the world for a long time and left unsurpassable assets for the entire world to cherish and benefit from, most important of which being architectural splendidness. Roman pedestal columns and pillars have never left their gloriousness and firm supremacy in contemporary construction; major European and American structures are the epitome of Roman inspiration. 

 Decorative Columns:

Our Roman Doric pedestal columns are specially designed with high quality plastic to bring the glorious touch of Roman architecture into your special events, imparting a Grand imperial touch to your decorations.

Multipurpose & Versatile:

Let these pedestal columns stand tall by your passage way or stage side, reminding of the past, decorate with our ivy garlands, pearl flowers, glitter accented leaves, ribbons, bows, or LEDs. Glam your events venue up with these triumphant pedestal columns standing proud, bedazzling your guests with their exultancy! 
Additional Information:
  • Can Hold Weight Upto: 20-25 LBS ( Max.)
  • How To stabilize: Can put sandbags inside the columns to stabilize it
  • Total of 20 separate pieces per order to make 4 full Empirical Roman Inspired pedestal columns
  • Uses: Floral Arrangements, Wedding Decor, Aisle Decor, Indoor & Outdoor Designs, Artworks, Stage Props, Wedding Ceremonies, Photography Props, Backdrops Ideas, Landscapes, and DIY Background Designing.

    • 76 Clear Rubber Zip Ties (10.75"L, 1/8" Thick)
    • 76 White Regular Zip Ties (4.75"L, 1/8" Thick)
Top and Bottom lids are interchangeable
Reusable, Collapsible, and Easy to clean
Need to remove protective plastic film before use
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Max weight holds on top of each box: 55-60 lbs
  • Panel Hole Insert: 1/2 cm
  • These are mirror-like, having a reflection. Not transparent
  • Easy to disassemble for storage
  • Panels and Rubber Zip Ties are reusable. Regular Zip Ties are one-time use only.
  • Perfect for Centerpiece Display in weddings, baby showers, parties, bakeries, graduation parties, and holidays.
  • All sizes are approximate measurements.
  • Note: Order is only for Box. Accessories Not Included
  • How to Care: Cleaning acrylic boxes should consist of wipe-cleaning with a soft rag or cloth while using a non-abrasive cleaner. For light stains or debris, you can also use canned air or clean water with a microfiber cloth. You should never use window cleaners, cleaning solvents with ammonia, or other chemical sprays as they can scratch or damage your acrylic products.

entry.title: 2 Ft Rose Gold Polystone Mirror Mosaic Pedestal Floor Candle Holder
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3600
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 61.18

[About]
Material: Polystone | Fiberglass | Mirror
Qty: 1 Candle Holder
Height: 2 Ft
Base: 9" 
Color: Rose Gold
Finish: Textured
Shiny, Sparkly, Rose Gold Mirror Mosaic Candle Holder
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

With shiny, sparkly, rose gold mirror mosaic accented decorative Candle Holders, you can add a dash of imperial sheen into your flower arrangements, bouquets, and plant decorations. Throw some light on these reflecting mirror adorned columns to create a majestic spectacle of glitz and glam. Either place these on their own to exude surreal shimmer and glimmer, or top with pots of fresh or artificial flowers, kissing balls, plants, or candles to create a charming medley of colors, sparkle, and festive glee.


Additional Information:

  • Material: Polystone | Fiberglass | Mirror
  • Qty: 1 Candle Holder
  • Color: Rose Gold
  • Height: 2 Ft
  • Base: 9" 
  • Top Diameter: 9.5" 
  • Opening Diameter: 7.25" 
  • Depth: 9" 
  • Ball Size: 8.5"x6"
  • Finish: Textured
  • Shiny, Sparkly, Rose Gold Mirror Mosaic Candle Holder
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
  • Note: Due to delicacy of the item, pieces may fall off during transit. We will add additional mirrors with the item and can be glue back easily.
